cleaned_text: US Biotek Food Sensitivity Testing Food sensitivities are recognized to be correlated with many chronic health conditions, such as IBS, eczema, fatigue, and others - but with proper identification and elimination of offending foods, many experience relief from their symptoms. The IgG, IgG4, and IgA antibody assessment panels can serve as useful tools in the identification of trigger foods in individuals. US Biotek offers a comprehensive 208 food panel, as well as 144- and 96-food panels to assess IgG, IgG4, and IgA antibody response to common foods. The 96-food panels are offered in five variations, including a General panel and specialized panels to identify allergens found in typical Asian, Japanese, Mexican, or Vegetarian diets. Test collection is simple - you will come into our office for a blood draw, and we will ship your samples to the lab for analysis. Click [here](https://www.usbiotek.com/our-tests) to learn more about testing, and please call our office with any questions.
